title: At Bertram's Hotel
description:
5 x 30 mins

June Whitfield once more plays Miss Marple in this Agatha Christie murder mystery, set in the 1950s. Miss Marple is staying at this upmarket London hotel, courtesy of her nephew Raymond. All seems just a little too perfect at this hotel, so how is the hotel connected with a mail train robbery, a missing vicar, a dashing young racing driver among others?

The result is tragedy.
